Body:
"""Test find_host_lun_id_for_volume."""
selected_masking_view, active_connections = (self.provisioning.
    get_active_masking_view_connections())
for connection in active_connections:
    lun = self.provisioning.find_host_lun_id_for_volume(selected_masking_view,
        connection[constants.VOLUME_ID_CAMEL])
    if lun is not None:
        self.assertIsInstance(lun, int)
        self.assertEqual(int(connection[constants.HOST_LUN_ADDRESS], 16), lun)
        break
